articles.title: Chinese Billionaire Who Fathered 100 Children Eyes US-Born Heirs For Business Succession
articles.mainIdea: Chinese Billionaire Who Fathered 100 Children Eyes US-Born Heirs For Business Succession
articles.summary: Benzinga: Chinese Billionaire Who Fathered 100 Children Eyes US-Born Heirs For Business Succession. Xu Bo, the billionaire founder and chairman of Guangzhou Duoyi Network, is said to be fathering a multitude of U.S.-born children to inherit his gaming empire. An investigation by the Wall Street Journal has revealed that Xu is seeking parental rights for at least four unborn children and has fathered approximately eight more through surrogacy. The report also indicates the possibility of many more. Earlier, Xuâ€™s company had announced that the gaming magnate has over 100 children born through U.

CATHARINES, Ontario, Dec. 26, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The News Forum will air a long-form, exclusive television interview with Alberta Premier Danielle Smith on Saturday, December 27 at 7:30 PM ET, as part of a special edition of Forum Dialogue. The interview features an extended, in-depth discussion on the political, economic, and energy issues shaping Alberta and Canada.
